timeline.message:
#7093 C_Flatrate_Term_C_Order_Term_ID

* Make it a real column
* Propagate it on term extension

https://github.com/metasfresh/metasfresh/issues/7093

timeline.bodyText:
wouldn't this be more efficient?
UPDATE C_Flatrate_Term term
SET C_Order_Term_ID = (SELECT ol.C_Order_ID
                       FROM C_OrderLine ol
                       WHERE ol.C_OrderLine_ID = term.C_OrderLine_Term_ID)
WHERE term.C_OrderLine_Term_ID IS NOT NULL
  AND term.C_Order_Term_ID IS NULL;
